item.title: markdown 语法学习
item.description: markdown-it demo 和even-preview对比，可以看出even-preview语法支持的不够全。 Advertisement :) pica - high quality and fast image resize in browser. babelfish - developer friendly i18n with plurals support and easy syntax. You will like those
